text:
State media #GlobalTimes just published an article trying to defame #pfizer’s #vaccine with big typos in the article* 😂

It twisted the blog writer’s word so much 🤦🏽‍♂️ read the original article! 

#CCP #china #propaganda #coronavirus #COVID19 #covid #science #sinovac #coronavac https://t.co/79cM4MVUnI
